title: Valuation
description: A context type representing the price and value of a holding.

value.title: Value
value.description: The value of the holding, expresses in the nominated currency.

price.title: Price per unit
price.description: The price per unit the the valuation is based on.

CURRENCY_ISOCODE.title: Valuation Currency
CURRENCY_ISOCODE.description: The valuation currency, which should conform to 3 character alphabetic codes defined in [ISO 4217](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html)

valuationTime.title: Valuation time
valuationTime.description: The time at which the valuation was performed, encoded according to [ISO 8601-1:2019](https://www.iso.org/standard/70907.html) with a timezone indicator included.

expiryTime.title: Expiry Time
expiryTime.description: The time at which this valuation expires, encoded according to [ISO 8601-1:2019](https://www.iso.org/standard/70907.html) with a timezone indicator included.
